trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Redding
There were no other sightings in Redding on or around October 13th 2009
divs: sighting detailson the night of october 13th, 2009 near the city of redding, ca at approximately 9:40pm my wife and i were corralling our horses who had been spooked by a major storm when i had noticed a very strange object in a small clear patch of sky. what immediately drew my attention was the obvious circular shape of the object. the object seemed to be tilted at a slight angle allowing us to clearly see that the reddish\orange lights formed a perfect circle. i estimate that the object was approximately 1& 1\2 miles to the east and at an elevation of about 3,000ft. the object seemed to be relatively close to the proximity of our local airport. the object was also above the elevation that planes descending into the airport would normally be. i have seen hundreds of planes land at the airport because the flight path is very close to our house. this object was clearly not on a normal flight path. another fact that should be noted is that the wind gusts that night were around 50mph and there was absolutely no helicopters flying out of the local airport. the object was clearly not moving and was holding perfectly still in extremely strong winds. another obvious detail was that it was very bright and the object was still visible as the thin clouds would pass over it. the oddity of this object was so intense that my wife and i just stood there staring at it even though we had a minor emergency on our hands. the storm had knocked over part of my fence and one of my horses had ran down the road towards our neighbors. my wife and i had just returned with him and were getting him back in the field. when we saw the object we stood there saying "what is that? what is that?" we watched the object for roughly 5 minutes before the clouds became to dense to see it anymore. my wife and i tried to explain it away but we just couldn't seem to come up with a logical answer for what it was we saw. my wife is a bit more skeptical than i am and she was troubled by what she saw. this story was made even stranger two days later on october 15th. my wife was reading the local rants and raves section of craigslist when she yelled for me to come over. someone had posted that at around 10:00pm on the night of october 14th (almost exactly 24 hours after our sighting) that the local police department had been flooded with calls about unidentified lights over the keswick dam area. which is only about 3 miles north of where we had our sighting. the post goes on to say that witnesses reported a bright flash like something had crashed in the mountains west of here towards eureka, ca. i have tried researching the local news reports and police station blogs but i have yet been able to verify the sightings. stories like this don't appear on rants and raves very often and i thought it was too coincidental that these alleged sightings had occurred within 24 hours of my wife and i seeing something we couldn't explain.
Summary: During a major storm my wife and I were trying to coral our spooked horsed when we noticed a very bright circle of redish/yellow lights that appeared in a small patch of clear sky.
